Class PodcastSoundbite

java.lang.Object
com.apptasticsoftware.rssreader.module.podcast.PodcastSoundbite
public class PodcastSoundbite extends Object
Represents a soundbite within a podcast episode. Soundbites can be used for episode previews, discoverability, audiogram generation, episode highlights, etc. The audio/video source of the soundbite is assumed to be from the item's <enclosure> element.

  • Method Details

    • getSoundbite

      public Optional<String> getSoundbite()
      Gets the title or description of the soundbite.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the soundbite title, or empty if not provided. The value should not exceed 128 characters as it may be truncated by aggregators.

    • setSoundbite

      public void setSoundbite(String soundbite)
      Sets the title or description of the soundbite.
      Parameters:
      soundbite - The free-form string from the podcast creator specifying a title for the soundbite. Should not exceed 128 characters.

    • getStartTime

      public double getStartTime()
      Gets the start time of the soundbite within the podcast episode.
      Returns:
      The time in seconds where the soundbite begins.

    • getStartTimeAsDuration

      public Duration getStartTimeAsDuration()
      Gets the start time of the soundbite within the podcast episode.
      Returns:
      The time in seconds where the soundbite begins.

    • setStartTime

      public void setStartTime(double startTime)
      Sets the start time of the soundbite within the podcast episode.
      Parameters:
      startTime - The time in seconds where the soundbite begins.

    • getDuration

      public double getDuration()
      Gets the duration of the soundbite.
      Returns:
      The length of the soundbite in seconds (recommended between 15 and 120 seconds).

    • getDurationAsDuration

      public Duration getDurationAsDuration()
      Gets the duration of the soundbite.
      Returns:
      The length of the soundbite in seconds (recommended between 15 and 120 seconds).

    • setDuration

      public void setDuration(double duration)
      Sets the duration of the soundbite.
      Parameters:
      duration - The length of the soundbite in seconds (recommended between 15 and 120 seconds).
